Package com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.base

The base API of interfaces to implement and call Automation scripts.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IApplicationScriptExecutionContext
    IProjectScriptExecutionContext is the subtype of an IScriptExecutionContext, which provides access to the current DaVinci Configurator instance.
    INotExecutableReasonBuilder
    INotExecutableReasonBuilder is used to set information for the user, why a certain IScriptTask is currently not executable.
    INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator
    The Interface INotExecutableReasonBuilder.IExecutableTaskEvaluator provides a java FunctionalInterface to evaluate if an IScriptTask is executable.
    INotExecutableReasonBuilder.INotExecutableReasonBuilderProvider
    The Interface INotExecutableReasonBuilderProvider is used to set the INotExecutableReasonBuilder instance into the current running ScriptExecutionContext.
    IProjectScriptExecutionContext
    IProjectScriptExecutionContext is the sub type of an IScriptExecutionContext, which provides access to the current active project.
    IScript
    IScript represents a loaded client side script.
    IScriptExecutionContext
    IScriptExecutionContext class represents one IScriptTask execution of the client code.
    IScriptIdentifier
    IScriptIdentifier defines the common methods in IScriptContainers and IScripts to identify them in the system.
    IScriptPath
    IScriptPath describes the file system location of an IScript or IScriptContainer.
    IScriptTask
    IScriptTask represents a created script task from the client side script.
    IScriptTaskCode<T extends IScriptExecutionContext>
    IScriptTaskCode defines the executable code of the IScriptTask.
    IScriptTaskExecutionResult
    IScriptTaskExecutionResult represents the result of one IScriptTask execution.
    IScriptTaskType
    IScriptTaskType defines the possible execution point of the IScriptTask and the arguments passed to the IScriptTask during execution.
    IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType
    The IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType marks the IScriptTask to be a task for EScriptTaskCategory#APPLICATION.
    IScriptTaskType.IInitScriptTaskType  
    IScriptTaskType.IProjectScriptTaskType
    The IScriptTaskType.IProjectScriptTaskType marks the IScriptTask to be a task for EScriptTaskCategory#PROJECT.
    IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature
    The IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature defines the signature of the IScriptTask.call(IServiceContext, Object...) method.
    ScriptingException.IScriptingClientExecutionException
    Marker interface that the exception is a ScriptingException, which was issued by the client code.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScriptExecutionContexts
    ScriptExecutionContexts provides methods to retrieve the current active IScriptExecutionContext.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IScriptTaskType.EScriptTaskTypeFeature
    IScriptTaskType.EScriptTaskTypeFeature describes properties of a certain IScriptTaskType.IScriptTaskTypeSignature.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScriptingException
    ScriptingException is the base type of all exceptions thrown by an IScriptTask execution.

Package com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.base Description

The base API of interfaces to implement and call Automation scripts. Every script and script task loaded from the Automation service, will be instances of the types defined in this package.

(c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.
